title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(gist) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Create Github Gist files — create_gist
text: name name Gist file. code String code Gist. description Code description.

title: Copy Github Gist files — get_gist
text: filename file name one GitHub account (see gistfiles) description file name one GitHub account (see gistfiles)

what: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
title: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
text: gist_addin() creates shiny gadget manage gists. Pick gists, press insert button code insert current document location cursor. Furthermore can create delete gists.

title: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
Explore GitHub Gist files — gistfiles
text: function copycat_gistfiles() returns list GitHub Gists.
